description:
This daypack combines Fjallraven's classic styling with up-to-date recycled and organic materials, and is perfect for every use, day trips while travelling and relaxed woodland jaunts. The main compartment is accessed via a long zipper that provides easy viewing of the contents, and features an inner padded sleeve that will hold a 15" laptop. Lightly padded shoulder straps and back panel provide a comfortable carry. Fjallfaven's rugged G-1000 Eco fabric can be treated with their Greenland Wax to greatly enhance the water-resistance of the material, and is made from recycled polyester and organic cotton.

  • Made from Fjallraven's G-1000 Eco fabric, a super-durable blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton with a dense weave
  • Comfortable lightly, padded shoulder straps and back panel
  • Access the large main compartment via the wide clamshell zip
  • Padded internal sleeve holds a 15" laptop
  • Classic Fjallraven logo from 1974
  • Can be treated with Fjallraven's Greenland Wax (sold separately) for greatly increased water resistance
name: Fjallraven Vardag 25 Backpack
